section.title: Setting a Retirement Date for a Virtual Machine
section.para: CloudForms Management Engine enables you to retire a virtual machine on a specific date.

procedure.title: To Set a Retirement Date for a Virtual Machine

step.para: From InfrastructureVirtual Machines, click on the virtual machine that you want to set a retirement date for.
In the Retirement Date field, type in the desired retirement date, or you can select one from the calendar control.
